tasks.label: Auto: init env & sync (uv)
tasks.command: set -e; if ! command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[PkMessages2025.INFO] uv not found in PATH"; fi; if [ ! -d .venv_linux ]; then echo "[PkMessages2025.INFO] creating .venv_linux"; uv venv --directory .venv_linux; fi; . .venv_linux/bin/activate; uv sync; python -V

linux.command: set -e; if ! command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[PkMessages2025.INFO] uv not found in PATH"; fi; if [ ! -d .venv_linux ]; then echo "[PkMessages2025.INFO] creating .venv_linux"; uv venv --directory .venv_linux; fi; . .venv_linux/bin/activate; uv sync; python -V

windows.command: $ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; if (-not (Get-Command uv -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Write-Host '[PkMessages2025.INFO] uv not found in PATH' }; if (-not (Test-Path '.venv')) { Write-Host '[PkMessages2025.INFO] creating .venv'; uv venv }; & '.\\.venv\\Scripts\\Activate.ps1'; uv sync; python -V
